title: Microsoft's Activision Deal Could Raise Competition Concerns, Says U.K. Watchdog; Regulator to expand probe into whether the deal hurts competition unless companies address concerns
text:
If the CMA isn't satisfied at that stage, the probe will enter a second phase involving a panel of independent reviewers, it said.

Microsoft President Brad Smith said the company is ready to work with the CMA on next steps and address any of its concerns.
